home.heroSubtitle: NEW REITER - Just 6 minutes from San Marco.
home.heroTitle: A luxury escape to the sea
home.description:
We are located in a perfect position to discover the city of Venice and beyond: a starting point to visit the center, enjoy the beaches, and explore the Dune degli Alberoni Oasis.

At the New Reiter, you will find all the comfort for an ideal 4-star stay, just a few steps from the water buses and the beaches of the Lido.

transportation.byCarDescription: Take the ferry from the Tronchetto Parking to Venice to Lido.
transportation.byTrainDescription: From Venice Santa Lucia station, take the vaporetto (lines 1, 5.2, or 2) to the Lido - Santa Elisabetta stop. The hotel is just a few minutes walk from the stop.
transportation.waterTaxiDescription: Available 24/7 at the taxi stand outside the airport.
transportation.alilagunaDescription: Water transport to the Lido - Santa Maria Elisabetta stop (about 1 hour travel time). From there, the hotel is a short walk away.

rooms.title: The Rooms
rooms.description: The rooms at New Reiter Hotel have been elegantly renovated to offer a luxurious and comfortable stay. Designed with a touch of sophistication, each room features a private bathroom, premium toiletries, a hairdryer, air conditioning, a minibar, a secure safe, a wake-up service, an LCD TV, and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Experience a perfect blend of style and comfort for an unforgettable stay.

singleUse.title: Double room for single use
singleUse.description: Double rooms for single use ensure a private stay in quiet and cozy surroundings.
singleUse.features: Equipped with a double bed for added comfort.

superior.title: Superior double room
superior.description: Spacious and comfortable rooms with premium amenities.
superior.features: Equipped with a double bed and enhanced services.

deluxe.title: Deluxe double room
deluxe.description: Luxurious rooms with extra space and high-end furnishings.
deluxe.features: Equipped with a king-size bed and premium amenities.

family.title: Family room
family.description: Spacious rooms ideal for families, offering comfort and convenience.
family.features: Equipped with two double beds for added comfort.

ourRestaurant.title: In the hotel, you can find our restaurant here
ourRestaurant.description: Al Cavaliere is our charming in-house restaurant, offering a delightful dining experience with seating for up to 100 guests. Overlooking the Grand Avenue, it's the perfect spot to enjoy a delicious meal in a warm and inviting atmosphere.

corporate.title: Strengthen Bonds, Create Memories
corporate.subtitle: Planning a trip with your colleagues, or your team?
corporate.description:
We specialize in organizing corporate retreats, team-building experiences, and professional gatherings. Having worked with international companies, we craft seamless and unforgettable events that foster collaboration and connection.

Let us handle the details while you focus on what truly matters, building relationships and making lasting memories.

location.title: Where are we?

location.description: The New Reiter Hotel is located on the Gran Viale del Lido of Venice.

location.golfClubDistance: A 20-minute drive from the Golf Club.
